About Me

Hi, I'm Jordan. I'm a software engineer and engineering leader. I work at Packback, where I lead the AI, Data, and Platform Engineering functions.

Bio

I'm originally from Atlanta, grew up in Chicago, and studied Statistics & Economics at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign. I'm passionate about data, infrastructure, engineering management, and just about everything in between.

Currently, I live in Chicago with my lovely partner Steph, Mojito (our cat), and Finley (our pup).
